title: Fabulous Dressup Royal Day Out
description: It's a nice summer day and this princess can't wait to go out and seize the day! Can you help her prep? I heard she can't make up her mind about her makeups and outfits. Our princess is counting on you to make her day fabulous! #fabulousdressup
instructions: Click or tap to make your selection. There are hundreds of combinations of makeup and outfits to make your perfect princess!

description: Play Magic Piano Tiles online for free.  game.

title: Bricks & Blocks
description: Play Bricks & Blocks online for free.  game.

title: Princess Devil Transformationd
description: Oh... No. Our princess standing near the bus stop and suddenly one strange girl met an accident and immediately her devil transformation into our princess body. Now our princess is a devil, so she likes to go for devil makeup and shopping before devil outfit transformation. Have fun!
instructions: Use mouse only

title: Merge Defense
description: Welcome to Merge Defense. Unknown enemies suddenly attacked us. we need build turrets and merge 2 same type turrets to increase the level .Let's defense our home now!
instructions: 1. Merge 2 same type Turrets! 2. Collect Turret Pieces from battles or buy them from the Shop!

title: Post Pandemic Fashion Outfits
description: The Post Pandemic Fashion is changing and now you have to accessorize a mask to every outfit and this is a hard task for every designer.In our latest Dress up game you will have to design specific outfits that a famous fashion advisor will pick for you and take part to different events.Do you think you can reproduce the fashion advisor outfit? Let's see!
instructions: Use the mouse to play

title: Police Escape
description: An addictive running game. Run as fast as you can, avoid the obstacle, to escape from the policeman. Collect the special items (acceleration and protection shield) for more advantages.
instructions: Tap to jump.

title: DR. Gun Boots
description: The doctor, who makes interesting experiments, creates a monster as a result of a wrong experiment one day. In order to escape from this monster, he gets rid of the monster by constantly passing through the levels with different endings of the same chapters. Pass all 10 levels and get rid of the monster!
instructions: WASD + Space press space to jump! Press space again after jumping and shoot!

title: Drift Race 3D
description: Tap to turn right, and release to turn left and stay on the endless road, drift your way to the finish line, beat the other players and be the drift king, the best racer.
instructions: Tap to turn right, and release to turn left

title: Funny Ragdoll Wrestlers
description: A super fun Ragdoll fighting game is beginning with the Funny Ragdoll Wrestlers game! The game is either played as a single player or two player. That's why what about calling a friend for a two player gaming before starting the game? In each fight, the one who scores 5 wins the game.
instructions: Player 1: Forward/Backward: "W, S" Punch: "A, D" Head hit: "E" Player 2: Forward/Backward: "UP and DOWN ARROW KEYS" Punch: "LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS" Head hit: "RIGHT SHIFT"

title: Kick The Zombie JulGames
description: Kick The Zombie is a fun anti-stress game where you get to kick a zombie. You can buy a multitude of weapons to use them against the zombie. Play Kick The Zombie now for an great fun!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Crazy Drift
description: Drive the car at high speed and make a good drift turn and collect the checkpoints. each level has dangerous obstacles, drive around obstacles and do not touch.
instructions: Use arrows to move the car.

title: Happy Village Toddlers & Kids Educational Games
description: The main goal of this game is to teach English language and many new things to kids 2 to 6 years old via more than 120 different fun and interesting games. These games can entertain your kid for hours and also teach them lots of new stuffs! Because of this game’s educational nature, it can be very useful for kindergartens and schools as an educational software and tool.
instructions: Touch on mobile device or mouse on PC.

title: Mr Smith
description: Mr Smith is a fun 2d shooter game with amazing characters and fun levels. You can play puzzle elements gameplay over 50 levels! Play Mr Smith now for amazing shooting experience!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Gorillas Tiles Of The Unexpected
description: One of the favorite games in a remastered version. Try to remove all the tiles in those 3 levels by matching at least 2 of the same tiles at once. Use the bomb mode when no matches are left to generate new ones and clean the whole level.
instructions: Use the mouse or the finger to remove matching pairs.

title: Golf Solitaire
description: Play Golf Solitaire, a web version of one of the most popular solitaire game in the world. If you are a solitaire enthusiast this is the perfect game for you!
instructions: The goal is to remove all the cards from the tableau piles. Only the topmost card in each column may be removed from the tableau. Cards may be moved from the tableau to the waste pile only if they are either one rank higher or one rank lower than the top card, regardless of suit. If no cards can be moved then you can get a card from the stock and turn it over to the waste pile.

title: Crazy Pixel Apocalypse 3
description: Try Crazy Pixel Apocalypse 3 Survival multiplayer in 3D, where you can combat against gamers and Bots zombie and a soldier from around the globe. In this Edition FPS, you can use numerous guns (from axes to sniper) and play with friends on incredible maps. Select your weapon and also start to inflict chaos and destruction in this SURVIVAL atmosphere! + Battle versus friends with a wide array of weapons, including bazookas, mini-weapons, axes, shotguns, combat rifles, snipers, RPG, as well as many others! Functions: MULTIPLAYER: 3 MODS: TEAM VS TEAM, PLAYERS VS ALL, ZOMBIE - 9 PIXEL GUN - 24 players - Many models AI zombie as well as Soldier pixel Bots OFFLINE MODE SINGLE PLAYER: Cubic first-person shooter Unique places in pixel style Dynamic Action in restricted spaces
instructions: WASD - control character Mouse = look around, shooting, change gun on scroll Tab - menu Q,E - attachments and camo gun Enter - chat

title: Jeep Driver
description: Jeep Driver is a fun driving game with 30 levels and amazing graphics. You can buy new vehicles in garage and upgrade them! Play this challenging game for great fun!
instructions: AD/ left,right arrows to control jeep W or up arrow to jump

title: Flat Jewels Match 3
description: Flat Jewels Match 3 is classic match 3 game in modern flat design. Enjoy well known game mechanics in this simple yet addictive version. Select either Levels mode or Time Attack gameplay mode. In Levels mode you will go through 150 levels fulfilling simple tasks. In Time Attack mode you will aim to reach highest possible score in limited time.
instructions: Swap gems to create rows and columns of three or more.

title: Chess Move 2
description: Defeat the Red King by strategically moving your pieces to get to the Red King's location. There are 24 challenging levels in this game where you'll sometimes need to slide the gameboard halves or use the gravity switcher squares. No time limit in this game so you can take your time and if you get stuck on a level you can always click the Video button on the Main Menu to see the walkthrough video. You don't need to know how to play chess as the chess pieces in this game will display the squares they can move to when they are clicked. In fact this can be a good introduction as to how chess pieces move!
instructions: Click on one of your blue chess pieces to highlight where it can move. To move the piece to a highlighted square, click on that square. To complete a level you'll need to move one of your blue pieces to the square the Red King occupies. More detailed instructions as well as a walkthrough video are available in the game via the buttons on the Main Menu.

title: Image Matching Educational Game
description: This game is an educational game for the kids. They can play and learn about pictures like fruits, vegetables, animals, food, fish, birds, robots, and more... Drag and drop the matching image into the box. Enjoy!
instructions: Drag and drop the matching image into the box.

title: 4 Colors Classic
description: Do you miss the fun and addictive game 4 Colors Classic? Or have you never played this great game? Then go ahead, choose a character and take part in wonderful friendly competitions. A perfectly recreated atmosphere of the game, detailed instructions, simple controls and many interesting opponents who are ready at any time to keep your company are waiting for you.
instructions: Choose the numbers of players. Match cards by color or number and be the first to get rid of them. Action cards run the game. Next player in sequence draws two cards and misses a turn. Skip card stops the player. Reverse card switches the direction of the turn to the opposite. Wild card can be places on any card at any time and allows you to change the color of the card. The wild draw four is a special card, allows you to change the color of the card and forces the next player to pick 4 cards.

title: Soccer Champ
description: Simple one-button football game with cute dogs. Kick ball when it is right on crosshair and score goals. Get as high score as possible within 30 seconds time limit.
instructions: Kick ball when it is right on crosshair. Get bonus time for precise kicks.

title: Word Cube Online
description: Open the gates to the world of letters in WordCube and give your vocabulary skills a workout! There are 4 game modes where you need to rearrange the letters and find the hidden words to get points!
instructions: WordCube is a fun puzzle game and all you need is your mouse to play this game. Choose between four different game modes and press the left click to rearrange the letters and search the cube for words.

title: Deer Hunter 2D
description: Deer Hunter 2D is a fun sniper game where you hunt deers. You can play 30 fun levels in a great shooting gameplay. Play Deer Hunter now for an amazing hunter experience.
instructions: Tap to play

title: Impostor.io
description: Become the superior life form by defeating other players in Impostor.io! This game is inspired by Among Us and features similar visuals and controls. The gameplay is completely different: no need to worry about sneaking and pretending. The curtains are down, it’s every man (or alien) for himself. Beat everyone up with various weapons and climb to the top of the leader boards. Collect energy cubes to level up and become stronger. Can you survive the battle and become the most powerful impostor in the universe?
instructions: Control the character by moving the mouse cursor. The direction is indicated by the arrow hovering over the screen. Click LMB to attack and RMB to speed up. Running too often will drain your stamina, preventing you from leveling up. Sometimes it is necessary to avoid a confrontation with a stronger player. Your life consists of several segments – that’s the number of hits you can take. If you are low on health, look for more cubes – upgrading will rejuvenate you.

title: Crazy Jokers 3D
description: Crazy Jokers kidnapped some people along with your Best Friend. What you have to do is, Collect more money and pass each round. You can save your friend only when you Beaten the Final round.
instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys to move Use Upgrades to Collect More Money Watch Ads to Earn More Diamonds Don't Get Eliminated

title: Island Monster OffRoad
description: Monster trucks of mountains, coasts and nature are ready! Show off your skills in the difficult terrain. Show off on special ramps designed for Monster Trucks and climb the hills! You can play Island Monster OffRoad as both 1 player and 2 player split screen. Invite your friend and prove that you are the driving master! Fun awaits you with its realistic physics...
instructions: PLAYER 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Power: "N" PLAYER 2: Move: "Arrow Keys" Power: "L"

title: Sniper Trigger Revenge
description: Have fun with this spectacular new game Sniper Trigger Revenge enjoy this game on kiz10.com totally free !!! If you like shooting games this game is ideal for you. Help the little stickman who needs your help to aim and shoot the little criminals who escaped from prison and refuse to return.
instructions: The objective of the game is to eliminate the different enemies in each level to complete the 15 missions of the game, but be careful that it is not as easy as it seems you must aim well to calculate the rebound of your bullets and not hurt the innocent who are in each level of the game. Try to use the objects around the map to hit the fugitives and keep the innocent safe. Have fun with this new exclusive game from kiz10.com

title: Penalty Kick Sport Game
description: This is a casual game in which you must point the ball correctly to the goal, shoot it and get point if you score a goal! If the goalkeeper gets three balls, you will lose! Gradually, the speed of the game is increased to make it more difficult. Let’s show everyone how good you are at soccer!
instructions: Touch on mobile device or mouse on PC.

title: Freecell Solitaire
description: Play Freecell Solitaire, a web version of the most popular solitaire game in the world. If you are a solitaire enthusiast this is the perfect game for you!
instructions: The goal is to build piles of the four suits from ace to king on the foundations. Cards can be moved between the tableau piles to a card with the next higher value if it is of the opposite color. Any top card can be moved to an empty cell or to an empty tableau pile.

title: Soft Girl Aesthetic
description: Welcome to the Soft Girl Aesthetic game. Skyler, Sunny, Ruby, and violet are the rainbow high school girls. They are up to date with the latest trends. Now they hear about the soft girl’s hashtag trending on both Instagram and Tiktok. They love to change themselves with the latest trends. Join and help them. Have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Mega Ramp Race
description: Get ready to play the ultimate impossible racing car on mega ramps to perform tricky challenges. It’s time to do some thrilling & risky for the crazy car racing challengers. Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra-smooth controls. Unlock over 15 challenging levels of impossible track
instructions: Use W A S D or Arrow Keys to control your Car. Hold Shift Key To Use Nitrogen. Or Use Mouse Left Button TO Control Screen Buttons.

title: Street Dunk
description: Street Dunk is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics. Street Dunk is an exciting basketball game where you can shoot a basketball in two modes of games, highscore and training session. Good Luck!
instructions: Touch and drag to aim. Release to shoot.

title: Ragdoll Fall
description: Play Ragdoll Fall online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Rainbow Frozen
description: Would you like to prepare Frozen, the favorite drink of hot summer days?Choose both flavors, fruit and glass decorations. Prepare the most beautiful Frozen according to your taste.
instructions: Use "MOUSE" and "LEFT-CLICK"

title: Cakes Mahjong Connect
description: "Cakes Mahjong Connect" is a delightful twist on the classic Mahjong game. Your task is to link two identical blocks, with only two turns allowed in the connecting line between them. Explore this unique version of the classic board game as you connect matching tiles while racing against the clock. Can you clear the board of all the delectable cakes before time runs out? Put your Mahjong skills to the test and satisfy your sweet tooth in this exciting game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Yummy Super Burger
description: Everybody likes burgers! Now is the time for you to make your own yummy super burger! Prepare the ingredients by following every part on the task list until your burgers are ready to sell. Make yummy burger as fast as you can. Serve to your customers on time.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Sky City Riders
description: Crazy bikers get ready for the show on top of the skyscrapers this time! You must complete the tracks in Sky City with your bike before the time runs out! If you complete 10 races on time, you can unlock 10 different bike skins. Do not forget to use NITRO power to pass long ramps! Continue with the "2 PLAYER" option to play with your friend. Prove to your friend who is a better bike master! If you collect 30 diamonds in Free Driving mode, you can unlock "Multi-Color Skin".
instructions: Player 1 Move: "ARROW KEYS" Nitro: "LEFT SHIFT" Player 2 Move: "W,A,S,D" Nitro: "N" Level Restart: "R" Change the Camera: "C"

title: Ear Clinic
description: A lot's of patient's are visiting to your clinic.You need to used the different grab tools to clean all the earwax. But ear canals are delicate, so make sure not to hurt them.Can you do it?
instructions: !Dive inside and make it spotty clean

title: Baby Adopter
description: Baby Adopter is a babysitting, nursery and dress up game for people who love to take care of little babies. Adopt and feed a cute little baby! Feed, buy clothes, shoes and toys and take care. You have to feed your baby when hungry. The baby has to be with energy equivalent of 30. And do not let your baby get sick... This is the goal of Baby Adopter. Game Locations. Another goal is to explore and purchase items for the Baby Room, Bathroom, Playground, Playroom, Family Room, Game Center, Music Room and others. And purchase all the toys. Egg Hunt. Another goal is to hunt, find, collect and complete the collection of mini trophy creatures. You need to look for eggs, hunt, crack and hatch and finally own creatures which are inside the eggs. The eggs can be found randomly in different game locations. Need to wait after each crack in order to proceed with the following crack. The egg will be hatched after 3 cracks. The egg which was cracked once can be found in the same location. Karma represents your overall game progress and player experience. The baby will grow after 100 days of age (after acquiring clothes and shoes). There are 2 mini games that would help earn points faster: Egg Match and Free Cell. Enjoy :)
instructions: The game is played by clicking or tapping the character or the items in the game.

title: Princess Kawaii Swimwear
description: The swimming season is open! The princesses go to the beach. What's the hottest piece of clothing on the beach? Swimsuit, of course! Just look at this new collection of cute kawaii swimwear: there are enough outfits to satisfy even the most moody princess. Delicate colors - blue, pink, pastel tones - will emphasize the sophistication of any girl. Choose your kawaii princess swimsuit and relax in style!
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Saw Machine.io
description: Here is a relaxation vehicle survival game with 3D stickman models and vehicles. You are able to use your weapon ahead to attack other players on the platform. Don't leave too far even if you are avoiding damage.
instructions: Tap and hold

title: Shooter Assassin
description: Choose your hero and start the assassination! Shooter Assassin game has different characters and different powers. Prove that you are a true assassin with 50+ Different levels. Kill enemies secretly and don't appear to anyone. If one of the enemies sees you, you should go around empty spaces on the map to make you forget yourself.
instructions: Select your destination on the map with a mouse or touch and start the assassination.

title: Jump Me
description: Up for new chessboard logical moves and strategy logic board puzzle? Well, you love the mind-boggling logical challenges of Jump Me – the ultimate Knights Tour checkerboard variation! We made sure to create a chessboard game & logic board puzzle that is both fun, challenging and brain teasing, so you can entertain and train your brain at the same time. Play with the Knight & his mighty horse and plan your chess board moves, make good strategy logic decisions and pass through all levels.
instructions: you move with the mouse

title: War Stars Medical Emergency
description: Play War Stars Medical Emergency online for free.  game.

title: Jumping Joe
description: Jumping Joe is a platform game, very fun and challenging. Help Joe to reach the end of the level. Click to jump or tap the screen. Collect the stars and the key to open the door and go to the next stage.
instructions: Touch the screen or click to jump

title: Pole Dance Battle
description: Pole Dance is an enchanting dancing game. Have you ever dreamed of artfully stretching your four ends to the fullest extent? Now the chance has come for you to present to the world your most graceful dancing posture.
instructions: Click or tap to control.

title: Slime Rider
description: Ride your slime to victory! A casual puzzle-platformer where the player can't directly control their movement, but must toggle buttons to redirect their path through increasingly difficult levels.
instructions: Tap, click, or [SPACE] to interact with buttons on signs.

title: Bubble Shooter Golden Chests
description: Bubble Shooter Golden Chests is a Classical bubble shooter game with many new challenges and power ups. Aim and release the bubble in order to combine it with other similar bubbles and collecting golden chest. Use power-ups to overcome the challenges.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.
